data.name: Shoppe Keep - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Sit back, relax and boot up your vinyl player to listen to the soothing melodies of the Shoppe keep official soundtrack. Containing the original musical score and a bonus Christmas pack.

Original soundtrack:
1. A big bright Marketful Day
2. After Hours
3. Battle Over The Barbarians
4. Bring Your items and Your Brooms!
5. Busy Midday Shopping
6. Comfort Selling
7. One Goal One Pride
8. Rise And Shine
9. The Journey To Success
10. Time Is A Virtue
11. Wakey Wakey Surgar Cakey
Bonus Track: Boom Box

Bonus Christmas Soundtrack
1. Bells, Toys, Candy Canes And Nose
2. Carol Of The Bells
3. Deck The Halls
4. Jingle Bells
5. Joy To The World
6. O Holy Night
7. Stars O The Mighty
8. Tis The Season Of The Gold
9. We Wish You A Merry Christmas
10. Wizardy Winter

data.short_description: Sit back, relax and boot up your vinyl player to listen to the soothing melodies of the Shoppe keep official soundtrack. Containing the original musical score and a bonus Christmas pack. Original soundtrack: 1. A big bright Marketful Day 2. After Hours 3. Battle Over The Barbarians 4. Bring Your items and Your Brooms! 5.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated video card with at least 1GB memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64Bit Architecture: AMD Phenom II X4 / Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 / ATI Radeon HD 5670 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB memory
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB memory
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
